author: kilasuit
body:
The code within https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility/commands/utility/InvokeCommandCmdlet.cs is actually for invoke Expression & this seems counter intuitive and perhaps an incorrect oversight.

Should this file be aptly renamed?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
Yes please!

The fewer misnamed files the better! 😄

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #10659, which has now been successfully released as `v7.0.0-preview.5`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.0.0-preview.5)

title: InvokeCommandCmdlet.cs is actually for invoke-expression cmdlet
